rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {SWK3180}
Must be enrolled in course version {3864, 3964, 3965}

description: This unit uses a range of case studies to assist the student in working through the complex issues faced by many social work clients. The unit asks the students to reflect on their knowledge and theory to draw upon appropriate assessment and intervention techniques for a range of social work situations.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
